thread.title: Excellent hotel in the heart of theatreland
thread.title_full: Excellent hotel in the heart of theatreland - Review of The Piccadilly London West End, London, England - TripAdvisor

author: Anthony M
title: Excellent hotel in the heart of theatreland
text: We expected a spartan room with the bare essentials; what we got was a home away from home! First off, we got a free upgrade - the room was spotless, and all the amenities functioned perfectly. The staff were most helpful and friendly - we had a fantastic time. Will certainly try to stay here on any future trips to London. Well done, Piccadilly!
